videos.author: CovertGoBlue
videos.title: I built a Commander legal Brawl deck and it slaps!
videos.description:
This video features a Commander-legal Brawl deck with Saheeli, Radiant Creator as the commander. Get the best of both worlds with this MTG Arena Brawl deck that can also be played in MTG's most popular format, COMMANDER!

Decklist - https://moxfield.com/decks/t0pIMOh2Qk6L7eF9Hk0g2A

videos.author: CovertGoBlue
videos.title: Who built this deck and why do they hate me?
videos.description:
This video reviews the Ulalek, Fused Attrocity Champion Brawl Deck available in the MTG Arena store and shows how I would upgrade it for an improved experience getting your daily wins.

Original Deck: https://moxfield.com/decks/NclFG1vkuEmdoEV7tysjDA
Upgraded Version https://moxfield.com/decks/BKEXA617VEa1-NnH_DbQHA
